channel.title: Sensitive categories in AdSense?
channel.description:
AdSense has several sensitive categories which are disabled by default. Now Google suggests enabling them to increase pressure on the bidders. We're not comfortable with that.
Does it make sense to enable them? Those who have AdSense, did you see any [significant] difference in revenue after enabling them?

item.title: Sensitive categories in AdSense?
item.dc:creator: itjobs
item.description:
There are quite a few sensitive categories such as “references to sex and sexuality,” “sexual and reproductive health” or “weight loss.”

They’re under “Allow and block ads.”

Read full topic
